channel.title: 🏢 Ho Chi Minh City University of Education on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Ho Chi Minh City University of Education on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Fundamental Convergence Analysis of Sharpness-Aware Minimization
item.description: This research establishes fundamental convergence properties for the widely-used SAM optimization algorithm, significantly advancing our theoretical understanding and practical applications.
